name: Sunny Passion
japanese_name: Sunny (サニー) Passion (パッション)
description: Sunny Passion,  Sunny Pas or SunnyPa for short, is a school idol group formed by Yuna Hijirisawa and Mao Hiiragi in Love Live! Superstar!!. They're depicted as friendly rivals to Liella!. Hailing from the island of , Yuna and Mao formed Sunny Passion in hopes of making the island more popular, as its population has been dwindling over the years. In the year preceding Liella!'s formation, the group won the Love Live's Tokyo regionals and reached the tournament finals. This inspired Keke Tang to move to Japan in order to become a school idol. They debuted with the song HOT PASSION!!. Their unit color is passion orange.
